sentences.english: Shall I covet my neighbour's maidservant?
sentences.chinese: 我该垂涎邻家的女佣吗？

sentences.english: He took me for his housemaid .
sentences.chinese: 他把我当作他的女佣人了。

sentences.english: With the maid, the family numbers eight.
sentences.chinese: 包括女佣，这一家共有八囗。

sentences.english: Half an hour later she fell ill, ” the maid said.
sentences.chinese: 半个小时之后她便病倒了”女佣说。
萨拉与女佣发生了争执。

sentences.english: A maidservant saw a snake enchantress so they believed that Zhao was taken by it.
sentences.chinese: 女佣人看见一条蛇女所以大家认为灵儿被抓。

sentences.english: Jubilantly, he decided to hire a maid to relieve his wife from her domestic tasks.
sentences.chinese: 高兴之余，他雇了一个女佣来减轻妻子做家务的负担。

sentences.english: Every year, many Asian women go abroad to work as housemaids.
sentences.chinese: 每年有很多亚洲妇女到国外去做家庭女佣。

sentences.english: I used to escort Mathur's daughter to her husband's chamber with the maidservant.
sentences.chinese: 我曾经与女佣一起护送马图尔的女儿到她丈夫的房间。

sentences.english: He watched the maid come in.
It seems to have struck him one day as he watched a housemaid receive a letter.
sentences.chinese: 这似乎已经杀了他，他看到有一天一名女佣收到一封。

sentences.english: The bad children left the room dirty to spite their maid .
sentences.chinese: 那些坏孩子把房间弄脏来刁难女佣人。

sentences.english: Maids and Butlers will now make the Murphy Bed and Heart Bed if they are messy.
sentences.chinese: 女佣和管家会整理折叠床和心形床的床铺。

sentences.english: It is reported, reports after Chen soon, this maid also arrives thepolice headquarters to report.
sentences.chinese: 据了解，在陈报案后不久，该女佣亦到警署报案。

sentences.english: Talk to the maids. They know it all.
sentences.chinese: 和女佣聊聊吧，她们知道的可多了。

sentences.english: The new  housemaid is like a bull in a china shop.
sentences.chinese: 新来的女佣是个毛手毛脚的人。

definition: abbr. for 侍應生|侍应生[shi4 ying4 sheng1]
